        function flash(element) {

            }
            else {
                properties.popupContent = htmlcontent;
                e.target.bindPopup(properties.popupContent).openPopup();                
            }
        }

        function showpopup(e, popupobj) {
            var processinitial = 1;
            
            try {                
                if (popupobj.type == "point" || popupobj.type == "multi") {
                    if (typeof e.target.getPopup() != 'undefined') { if (popupobj.id == "pollingstations") { processinitial = 1; } else { var popup = e.target.getPopup(); processinitial = 0; } }
                }
                if (processinitial == 1) {                    
                    // use the popup object and construct a popup
                    var popupicondiv = document.createElement('div');
                    var popupicon = document.createElement('img');
                    popupicon.src = popupobj.icon;
                    popupicondiv.appendChild(popupicon);
                    
                    var popuptitle = document.createElement('div');
                    popuptitle.className = "layerinfotitle";
                    popuptitle.innerHTML = popupobj.title;

                    var popupsubtitle = document.createElement('div');
                    popupsubtitle.innerHTML = popupobj.description + "<br/><br/>";
                    
                    var popupcontainer = document.createElement('div');
                    var ul = document.createElement('ul');
                    ul.id = popupobj.id;
                    ul.className = 'reportli1000';
                    
                    if (popupobj.events.length) {
                        var legend = document.createElement('legend');
                        legend.innerHTML = "options";
                        ul.appendChild(legend);
                        i = 0;

                        // go generate the li's and events
                        popupobj.events.forEach(function (obj) {
                            var li = document.createElement('li');
                            li.id = popupobj.id + i;
                            li.innerHTML = obj.eventname;
                            
                            if (obj.eventname == "visit web site") { li.onclick = function (e) { window.open(obj.event + obj.switches.replace('&filter=0', '')); }; }
                            else if (obj.eventname == "view polling station") { li.onclick = function (e) { getpollingstationfromref(obj.event); } }
                            else if (obj.eventname == "view this in the planning portal") { li.onclick = function (e) { window.open(obj.event); }; }
                            else { li.onclick = function (e) { window.open(obj.event + popupobj.latlng); }; }
                            ul.appendChild(li);
                            i++;
                        });
                    }

                    // Add the rest
                    popupcontainer.appendChild(popupicondiv);
                    popupcontainer.appendChild(popuptitle);
                    popupcontainer.appendChild(popupsubtitle);
                    popupcontainer.appendChild(ul);

                    // Bind the popup
                    if (popupobj.type == "pointmarker") {
                        if (map.hasLayer(propertymarker)) {
                            map.removeLayer(propertymarker);
                        }
                        propertymarker = L.marker([popupobj.lat, popupobj.lng], { icon: L.icon({ iconUrl: popupobj.icon, iconSize: [30, 30], iconAnchor: [30, 0], popupAnchor: [-15, 0] }) }).addTo(map).bindPopup(popupcontainer).openPopup();                       
                    }
                    else if (popupobj.type == "multi") {
                        e.target.bindPopup(popupcontainer).openPopup(); 
                        map.on('popupclose', function (feature) {                            
                            hideshowpollingareas(popupobj.featureid, 'HIDE');                            
                        });
                    }
                    else {
                        e.target.bindPopup(popupcontainer).openPopup();                        
                    }
                }
            }
            catch (err) {
                console.log(err);
            }
        }

        function layerover(e) {

                point = new Proj4js.Point(e.latlng.lng, e.latlng.lat);

        function clearlayers() {
            // remove searched for properties
            if (map.hasLayer(propertymarker)) {
                map.removeLayer(propertymarker);
            }

            // remove point layers (needs to check marker layer)
            featurespoint.forEach(function (obj) { if (map.hasLayer(eval(obj.marker))) { map.removeLayer(obj.marker.removeLayer(obj.geojson_d3)); } });
            
            // remove area layers - parish, ward and feature
            features.forEach(function (obj) { if (map.hasLayer(obj.geojson_d3)) { map.removeLayer(obj.geojson_d3); } });
            wards.forEach(function (obj) { if (map.hasLayer(obj.geojson_d3)) { map.removeLayer(obj.geojson_d3); } });
            parishes.forEach(function (obj) { if (map.hasLayer(obj.geojson_d3)) { map.removeLayer(obj.geojson_d3); } });
            
            // reset counters
            for (i = 0; i <= 7; i++) { $(".cbgcount" + i).html($("#cbg" + i + "00 input:checked").length + '/' + $("#cbg" + i + "00 input").length); }
                       
            // reset checked item status            
            $("input[type='checkbox']").attr("checked", false).checkboxradio("refresh");

            // reset selected header status            
            var layericons = ["cbgicon100", "cbgicon200", "cbgicon300", "cbgicon400", "cbgicon500", "cbgicon600", "cbgicon700"];
            for (i = 0; i < layericons.length; i++) {
                if ($("#" + layericons[i]).hasClass(layericons[i] + "opened")) {
                    $("#" + layericons[i]).removeClass(layericons[i] + "opened");
                    $("#" + layericons[i]).addClass(layericons[i] + "openedoff");                    
                }
                else {
                    $("#" + layericons[i]).removeClass(layericons[i] + "opened");
                    $("#" + layericons[i]).addClass(layericons[i] + "off");
                }                
            }
        }

        function onTwoFingerDrag(e) {
            if (e.type === 'touchstart' && e.touches.length === 1) {
                e.currentTarget.classList.add('swiping')
            } else {
                e.currentTarget.classList.remove('swiping')
            }
        }
               
        function addremovelayer(thelayer, markerlayer, counter, container) {
            var containeropened = container.replace("cbg", "cbgicon") + "opened";
            var containeropenedoff = container.replace("cbg", "cbgicon") + "openedoff";
            var containerparent = container.replace("cbg", "cbgicon");

            if (map.hasLayer(markerlayer)) { 
                map.removeLayer(markerlayer.removeLayer(thelayer));
                $("." + counter).html($("#" + container + " input:checked").length + '/' + $("#" + container + " input").length);                
            }
            else {                                
                map.addLayer(markerlayer.addLayer(thelayer));                
                $("." + counter).html($("#" + container + " input:checked").length + '/' + $("#" + container + " input").length);                
            }
            if ($("#" + container + " input:checked").length > 0) {
                $("#" + containerparent).removeClass(containeropenedoff);
                $("#" + containerparent).addClass(containeropened);
            }
            else {
                $("#" + containerparent).removeClass(containeropened);
                $("#" + containerparent).addClass(containeropenedoff);
            }

        }
        
        function addremovelayeroverlays(type, overlayname, counter, container) {
            var containeropened = container.replace("cbg", "cbgicon") + "opened";
            var containeropenedoff = container.replace("cbg", "cbgicon") + "openedoff";
            var containerparent = container.replace("cbg", "cbgicon");
                                               
            overlayname.forEach(function (obj) {
                if (map.hasLayer(obj.geojson_d3)) {
                    map.removeLayer(obj.geojson_d3);
                    $("." + counter).html($("#" + container + " input:checked").length + '/' + $("#" + container + " input").length);
                }
                else {
                    try {
                        map.addLayer(obj.geojson_d3);
                            $("." + counter).html($("#" + container + " input:checked").length + '/' + $("#" + container + " input").length);
                        }
                    catch (err) { }
                }
            });

            if ($("#" + container + " input:checked").length > 0) {
                $("#" + containerparent).removeClass(containeropenedoff);
                $("#" + containerparent).addClass(containeropened);
            }
            else {
                $("#" + containerparent).removeClass(containeropened);
                $("#" + containerparent).addClass(containeropenedoff);
            }
        }

        function hideshowpollingareas(strid, strhideshow) {            
            if (strhideshow == 'SHOW') {
                pollingjson.forEach(function (obj) {                    
                    if (obj.id == strid) {
                        map.addLayer(obj.geojson_d3);                        
                    }
                });
            }
            if (strhideshow == 'HIDE') {
                pollingjson.forEach(function (obj) {
                    
                    if (obj.id == strid) {                        
                        map.removeLayer(obj.geojson_d3);                        
                    }
                });
            }
        }

        function getpollingstationfromref(pollingref) {                                   
            if (!$("#overlayscb203").is(':checked')) {                
                if (!$('#cbgicon200').hasClass("cbgicon200opened") && !$('#cbgicon200').hasClass("cbgicon200openedoff")) {
                    $('#cbgicon200').trigger('click'); 
                }
                $('#overlayscb203').trigger('click');                
            } 
            
            FeaturesPollingStations2017.marker._featureGroup.eachLayer(function (featureObj) {                
                var currentPollingRefs = featureObj.feature.properties.PollingDistrictReferences.replace(' ','').split(',');
                for(i=0;i<currentPollingRefs.length;i++)
                {
                    if (currentPollingRefs[i] == pollingref) {                        
                        var latlngPoint = new L.LatLng(featureObj.feature.geometry.coordinates[0], featureObj.feature.geometry.coordinates[1]);                                             
                        try
                        {
                            featureObj.fireEvent('click', { latlng: [latlngPoint], layerPoint: map.latLngToLayerPoint(latlngPoint), containerPoint: map.latLngToContainerPoint(latlngPoint) });
                        }
                        catch(event)
                        { console.log("catch fired"); }
                        
                    }
                }                
            });
        }

        function hideshowlayericon(layercontainer, enablemapclick) {
            //  layercontainer e.g. #cbgo100 etc             
            //  if the enablemapclick is set this adds a click listener to the map            
            var containerinner = layercontainer.replace("cbgo", "cbgi");
            var container = layercontainer.replace("cbgo", "cbg");
            var containericon = layercontainer.replace("cbgo", "cbgicon");            
            var containericonclean = containericon.replace('#', '');
            
            var layers = ["#cbgi100", "#cbgi200", "#cbgi300", "#cbgi400", "#cbgi500", "#cbgi600", "#cbgi700"]; 
            
            if ($(container).is(':visible')) {
                for (i = 0; i < layers.length; i++) {
                    if (layers[i] != containerinner) {
                        $(layers[i]).show("fast");
                    }
                    else {
                        $(container).hide("fast");
                    }
                }
                if ($(layercontainer + " input:checked").length > 0) {
                    $(containericon).removeClass(containericonclean + "opened");
                    $(containericon).addClass(containericonclean);
                }
                else {
                    $(containericon).removeClass(containericonclean + "openedoff");
                    $(containericon).addClass(containericonclean + "off");
                }
                if (enablemapclick) {
                    if (map.hasEventListeners('click')) {
                        map.off('click', mapclick);
                    }
                }
            }
            else {
                // Refresh the scroller            
                $(container).show("fast");
                for (i = 0; i < layers.length; i++) {
                    if (layers[i] != containerinner) {
                        $(layers[i]).hide("fast");
                    }                    
                }
                if ($(layercontainer + " input:checked").length > 0) {
                    $(containericon).removeClass(containericonclean);
                    $(containericon).addClass(containericonclean + "opened");
                }
                else {
                    $(containericon).removeClass(containericonclean + "off");
                    $(containericon).addClass(containericonclean + "openedoff");
                }
                if (enablemapclick) {
                    map.on('click', mapclick);
                }
            }            
        }

        $.params = function (param_name) {
            var result = 0;
            try {
                var value = new RegExp('[\\?&]' + param_name + '=([^&#]*)').exec(window.location.href);
                if (value[1] != null)                    
                    result = value[1];
            }
            catch (err) { result = 0; }
            return result;
        }

        $(document).on("pagecreate", "#mapPage", function () {
            var searching = null;
            $(".autocomplete").on("listviewbeforefilter", function (e, data) {
                if (searching) {
                    clearTimeout(searching);
                }

                var $ul = $(this), $input = $(data.input), value = $input.val(), html = "";                
                $ul.html("");

                searching = setTimeout(function () {
                    var length = value.replace(' ', '').length;
                    if (value && length > 5) {
                        $('#loading').show();
                        $ul.hide();
                        $ul.listview("refresh");

                        $.getJSON("resources.ashx?getAddresses|" + $input.val(), function (properties) {
                            properties.forEach(function (property) {
                                html += "<li value='" + property.uprn + "'>" + property.description + "</li>";
                            });                           
                            $ul.html(html);
                            $ul.listview("refresh");
                            $ul.trigger("updatelayout");
                            $('#loading').hide();
                            $ul.show();
                        });
                    }
                }, 1000);
            });
        });

            $("#headerplot").click(function (e) {
                e.stopPropagation();                
                if ($("#featurescontrol").is(":visible")) {
                    for (i = 0; i <= 7; i++) {

                else {

                    if (map.hasEventListeners('click')) { map.off('click', mapclick); }

            dest = new Proj4js.Proj('EPSG:4326');                               //destination coordinates will be in Longitude/Latitude

            Proj4js.transform(source, dest, point);                             //do the transformation.  x and y are modified in place                            
            map = L.map('map', { zoomControl: false, maxZoom: 18, gestureHandling:true, minZoom: 10 });
            osm = new L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', { minZoom: 9, attribution: '© <a href="http://osm.org/copyright">OpenStreetMap</a> contributors' }).addTo(map);
            //osm = new L.tileLayer('http://otile{s}.mqcdn.com/tiles/1.0.0/map/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', { subdomains: ['1','2','3','4'], minZoom: 9, attribution: '© <a href="http://osm.org/copyright">OpenStreetMap</a> contributors' }).addTo(map);                      

            var baseMaps = { "OSM - Open Street Map": osm }
            map.setView([point.y, point.x], 11);                        
            //var osmb = new OSMBuildings(map).loadData();
             
            // WARDS            
            wards.forEach(function (obj) {
                d3.json(obj.url, function (collection) {
                    obj.geojson_d3 = L.geoJson([collection], { style: function (feature) { return obj.style; }, id: obj.id, onEachFeature: onEachFeature});
                    addlayerdesc(obj.geojson_d3, obj.wardname, obj.icon, -5, -10);
                    loadedlayer(obj.wardname);
                });
            });
            
            // PARISHES
            parishes.forEach(function (obj) {
                d3.json(obj.url, function (collection) { obj.geojson_d3 = L.geoJson([collection], { style: obj.style, id: obj.id, display: "block", onEachFeature: onEachFeature }); addlayerdesc(obj.geojson_d3, obj.parishname, obj.icon, 0, 0); loadedlayer(obj.parishname); });
            });
             
            // FEATURES - POLYGONS            
            features.forEach(function (obj) {                
                d3.json(obj.url, function (collection) { obj.geojson_d3 = L.geoJson([collection], { style: obj.style, id: obj.id, display: "block", onEachFeature: onEachFeature }); loadedlayer(obj.featurename); });                
            });
                       
            // FEATURES - POINTS
            featurespoint.forEach(function (obj) {                
                d3.json(obj.url, function (collection) { obj.geojson_d3 = L.geoJson([collection], { pointToLayer: function (feature, latlng) { return L.marker(latlng, { icon: obj.icon }); }, id: obj.id, display: "block", onEachFeature: onEachFeature }); loadedlayer(obj.featurename); });                
            });
                       
            // Generate pre-cached members info                        
            wards.forEach(function (obj) {
                $.getJSON("resources.ashx?getMembers|" + obj.wardcode, function (members) {
                    var html = "";
                    members.forEach(function (member) {
                        // get the list of members
                        html += "<li class=\"nolrborder councillorsli\"><div class=\"partyanddescription\"><div class=\"councillordetails\"><h3>" + member.title + " " + member.firstname + " " + member.lastname + "</h3><p>" + member.email + "<br/><a href=\"" + member.webpage + "\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"members webpage - opens in new window\">members page</a></p></div><div class=\"" + member.partyclass + "\"><img src=\"" + member.partylogo + "\" alt=\"political party\"></div></div><div class=\"councillorimage\"><img src=\"" + member.srcimage.replace("img","resources") + "\" alt=\"councillor image\"></img></div><div class=\"separator\"></div></li>";
                    });
                    obj.html = "<html><div class=\"councillorsouter\"><img src=\"resources/img/areas1.png\"></div><div class=\"layerinfotitle\">Daventry Ward</div><div class=\"wardandtitle\">Type: Ward<br/>Name: " + obj.wardname + "</div><h2 class=\"layerinfotitle\">Councillor(s) for this area</h2><div id=\"councillorslist\" class=\"councillorslist\">" + html + "</div>";                    
                });
            });
            
        });
        $(document).on('pageshow', function () {           
            $("#map").height($(window).height()).width($(window).width());           
            map.invalidateSize();

            map.addEventListener("touchstart", onTwoFingerDrag);
            map.addEventListener("touchend", onTwoFingerDrag);
            
        });
        $(window).on("resize", function () {
            $("#map").height($(window).height()).width($(window).width());            
        }).trigger("resize");        
        $(document).on("click", ".autocomplete li", function () {
            var html = "";
            var uprn = $(this).attr('value');

            var selectedItem = $(this).html();
            $(this).parent().parent().find('input').val(selectedItem);
            $('.autocomplete').hide();
            
            $.getJSON("resources.ashx?getAddressFromUPRN|" + uprn, function (properties) {                                 
                 updateMap('' + properties[0].lat + '', '' + properties[0].lng + '');
                 $('#search').css('overflow', 'hidden');
                 $('#lookup').hide();
                 events = [];
                 
                 eventWheresMyPollingStation.event = properties[0].pollingref
                 eventReplacementItems.event = eventReplacementItems.originalevent + '?uprn=' + properties[0].uprn + '&pc=' + properties[0].postcode;
                 eventMissedCollections.event  = eventMissedCollections.originalevent + '?uprn=' + properties[0].uprn + '&pc=' + properties[0].postcode;
                 
                 if (properties[0].primarydesc == 'Residential') { events = [eventReplacementItems, eventMissedCollections, eventCouncilTax, eventWheresMyPollingStation] }
                 var reportingoptions = { type: "pointmarker", id: "addressdetails", icon: "resources/img/searchfoundmarker.png", title: "Address Details", description: "<br/>" + properties[0].description + "<br/><br/>Address type: " + properties[0].primarydesc +", "+ properties[0].tertiarydesc +"<br/>Ward: "+ properties[0].ward +"</br>Parish: "+ properties[0].parish +"</br>Polling District: "+ properties[0].pollingref, latlng: "", lat: properties[0].lat, lng: properties[0].lng, events: events }                 
                 showpopup(properties[0], reportingoptions);

             });
        });
